channel.title: browser on BrianDGLS
channel.description: Recent content in browser on BrianDGLS

item.title: ES6 DOM Scripting Tricks
item.description: In this post we are going to make use of some ES6 features in regards to DOM scripting. Features like destructuring, the spread operator, and the for..of loop lend themselves well to DOM scripting.

item.title: Canvas Fireworks Using Javascript
item.description: This post is a tutorial explaining how to code a fireworks display using the canvas element. No external libraries or frameworks will be necessary.
